website_summaries.verdict: Intertwines with your own hair for a natural look. Gives instant appearance of thicker, fuller, and healthier hair in one application.
pros: Resists wind, rain, and sometimes even sweat after a  gym workout
Can be easily removed with a regular shampooing
Covers up and disguises thinning hair, bald spots, and extension tracks in between visits
Nine color shades for men and women
cons: Could smudge on pillow during sleep as well as on clothing in daytime
Can be itchy on scalp and coloring may get under nails when applied without applicator

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT AUBURN
customer_reviews.text: This is a TERRIBLE color! There is nothing auburn about it. It looks like a medium ash brown. There is no red undertone in it at all. It is a green undertone which is the total opposite of what it should be. I am extremely disappointed and will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: Gina I.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive and too messy.
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked this product. But as I was using it it would get all over everywhere. Then it started itching my neck. So I threw it away. I don't recommend this. It's just a temporary fix and I do mean temporary. Instead buy a wig a hair topper or whatever else works for you. This is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: blondie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job without looking cheesy.
customer_reviews.text: This works better than I thought it would. It covers the scalp areas that my super thin hair shows. I wish the container was a little bigger for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Auburn - no attachments. Have baby fine hair and this works excellent to fil in around the face hair line and top. Very happy I tried it. Even told and showed my hairdresser the results. Baby fine is baby fine even with curly hair. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KATE

customer_reviews.title: The original AUBURN color must be gone.  This product used to match my med auburn hair
customer_reviews.text: I had read in another review that the current product is a muddy color but I had hoped I could order one out of the old inventory. It came yesterday and the red is gone. It used to match perfect and now it is more of a med/light mousy brown. Hope this helps if you were used to the earlier AUBURN color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Family

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: As we get older our hair begins to thin! This will cover those areas where the scalp is too noticeable!
customer_reviews.author: mkm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff here
customer_reviews.text: This really works to fill in thinning hair. Stays on until you shampoo. I’ve used several different colors and they match up perfectly. I’m never without this product!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: My hair thins on and off depending on the cancer ...
customer_reviews.text: My hair thins on and off depending on the cancer meds I'm on. This product fills the spaces near the scalp so I don't have to wear a wig nearly as often....and even when my hair has grown in, Tokkik hides the white roots a bit longer which lets me stretch the time between salon appointments.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Sue

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing short of amazing. Fairly cheap and easy to use. Makes my husband feel younger and helps him look his best!
customer_reviews.author: Brett M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Auburn match.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the Auburn, size .42 today. And it actually matches my hair. I have been dying my hair dark brown to have a color that matches my other fibers/sprays. I'm pretty excited I can have my red back. I also bought the applicator which fits the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work and is Embarrassing
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to get it were it is needed, and the power is noticeable in daylight. It caused an embarrassing moment for me.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Nooooope!
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. Its too light. Its a powder you shake onto the desired spot. Thought it was a spray. #rif
customer_reviews.author: Christina Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: My aunt loved it. It filled in her thinning spots.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Secret Weapon!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! My hair problem is a thinning crown so I was skeptical if this would really cover up this problem, but it did. There are many color choices to chose from. I shake on the Toppik fibers, they stay in place all day, all night. It's my "secret weapon" and I won't ever be without it! Feeling less embarrassed about my thinning hair is a wonderful thing!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: good for "basic" hair styles
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff. It stays put with hairspray. I have been using it for a while and will keep on buying it. But I noticed if I have lots of hair products on the scalp, it doesn't "stick" as well. So, be careful not to put too much product close to the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: talltreesinc

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes causes my scalp to itch. A smaller powder release area would make it easier to apply where it is needed. It does cover well and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Winegarden

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Toppik for around a year now. My hair is thinning due to grave's disease and this product really helps fill in the thin spots without being super obvious. It takes a little practice to get the right amount to not look weird and fake on your scalp but after you get that down it is amazing and really helps with my self-esteem. I never leave the house without it on :)
customer_reviews.author: Cherron

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I only use this when my gray roots start showing before my touch up. I have very fine hair not losing any yet. I am 69 and reason had to order from internet is because Sally's does not carry the Auburn which don't understand why since there is a lot of women with red hair. Good product but forget the applicator it come with little holes in top. I could never get the applicator on bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A. Mcclanahan

customer_reviews.title: Cost is good. Use it and stays in till washed
customer_reviews.text: Lost my hair to chemo and came back very thin. This helps it look fuller. Wish it came in a lighter red shade. Cost is good. Use it and stays in till washed, even more than a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I have thinning hair just on top in the middle...a typical thinning area for women. I'm not bald and still have quite a bit of hair for the powder to adhere to. And this works pretty good. Its not perfect. But it does make the roots of my hair darker (than gray grow-out) and thus makes my hair appear thicker than it really is. If you get it on your scalp and then rub it off, it can look kind of funny. It can "sprinkle" all over the sink / cabinet when you put it on if you're not careful. Overall though, its really pretty good and a lot cheaper/easier than the $15k hair transplant I was considering.
customer_reviews.author: Cinder

customer_reviews.title: Works well . Hides embarrassing spots of thinning
customer_reviews.text: Works very well . Converse unsightly and embarrassing thinning spots . This size bottle lasted me two and a half months . Would definitely recommend . Take the risk you’ll be happy .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It does exactly what it says it does. It covers thinning hair areas and makes them look much fuller than they actually are. The colors are pretty close but I often use a couple to get the color I really need. I highly recommend the applicator top as it makes application easier and you use much less!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. S. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works best of the products like it the red is kind of dark
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My hair looks so much thicker. Easy to use, stays in place and color matches perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Its not quite the color of a natural redhead. It actually makes my hair darker. coverage is fairly good. do not scratch or it comes off. Be sure to use hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I tried this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Dealing with thinning hair is not easy, and many products disappoint. Toppik doesn't! The results are immediate and indetectable (unless one gets too heavy-handed with the shaker!). Just be careful opening it because a spill is a bit of a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Ramses biggest fan

customer_reviews.title: Toppik Regular Auburn Hair Building Fibers
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Just sprinkle in your hair and it looks so much thicker. If you color your hair, great to use between colorings. It does stay in until you wash your hair. Get it...you will love it!!!!!!!!!! Karen - Punta Gorda, Fl
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: You really need the whole kit.
customer_reviews.text: Meaning that there is some sort of fixative spray available, you probably want to buy that although I haven't. Without it, this product tends to disappear quickly, although it works reasonably well at the start and blends nicely, the color is right for my reddish brown hair.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover Up
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this product and I am very well satisfied with it. Gives me time in between coloring my hair to cover the grey I have thin hair and it really does a good job for me. I will continue using this. Thanks to Amazon for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Moonpath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Covers embarrassing thin spots due to hormonal shifts or thyroid imbalance.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Arini

customer_reviews.title: Magic hair
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this since a friend of ours showed up with it on. It makes his hair look thicker and filled in. One word of warning is to check the top of your head with a mirror to avoid blotches though.
customer_reviews.author: BrandiM

customer_reviews.title: color
customer_reviews.text: didnt like it, color is orange brown not red at all
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific, easy to use, lasts all day if you lightly sprinkle it in your hair part or other thin places, then put a light spray of hair spray over it. Great at camouflaging thinning hair.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Falls out.
customer_reviews.text: Falls out of hair and does not last the entire day!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Monopoly
customer_reviews.text: This is the top of the lie in hair fibers. I have to stay on a budget and use 2nd and 3rd best at times due to price.
customer_reviews.author: Judithann

customer_reviews.title: To Lite
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because it was to lite and did not serve it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Soto

customer_reviews.title: Toppik Hair Building Fibers 12g/0.42oz - Auburn
customer_reviews.text: The Toppik Hair Building Fibers 12g/0.42oz in Auburn works really good when set in place with hair spray. Auburn is a difficult color to find.
customer_reviews.author: Dixi Conner

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thinning hair and this product has given me back so much confidence in how my hair looks. Easy to use, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cover up
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for covering up thinning spots of hair. This container is long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Rod R.

customer_reviews.title: thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: Have been Using for awhile & love the way it helps to fill in the thin areas.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Hair Thinning due to Radiation
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I needed. It filled in places in my hair that had been damaged by brain surgery and radiation treatments.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Big help
customer_reviews.text: This works really well to cover areas needed. I love it and use it often. Highly recommended. You should try it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for covering up any thinning spots on your hair. Their is a color for most all hair colors.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, blends into hair well. Doesn't rub or flake off.
customer_reviews.author: MWG

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's very messy, and not sure I want to use it every day. I will finish what I have, but won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Abbegirl

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Good Product for making your head look full. Works well with thinning hear. Comes in assorted colors to blend well.
customer_reviews.author: OldiesRock

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Helpful Product
customer_reviews.text: This magic powder makes your hair seem fuller hiding those spots that are thinning. It also makes parts less obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Doodle's Mom

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this products covers my thinning hair problems and the fibers give it extra body.
customer_reviews.author: egbert sousse

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a customers hair that was thinning on top.Color was a great choice and fill in remarkably well
customer_reviews.author: Connie Sandusky

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: you can't get your hair wet though, and you need to wash it out everyday or it looks BAD. But it works really well on my red hair, and it covers in my balding area, which is the top front of my hair, you do need to keep the hairline covered, I have bangs so it looks fine. makes my hair look normal.
customer_reviews.author: Crysannia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. works great to cover scalp. Would recommend this to anyone who is feeling upset about hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A Coccaro

customer_reviews.title: YES, YES, YES
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. I feel more confident knowing my hair looks full and healthy again. Toppik covered all the sparsely spaces on my head. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stuff love it plz have it available at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stuff love it plz have it available at the stores I need to purchase it soon again need auburn color to be available at the stores thx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: color cover up
customer_reviews.text: the value of the product for me was to color my bald scalp so it is less obvious. the powder is not hair, it offers color to the "white" area where you have no hair. it will get on your clothes and pillow case, but I found no permanent discoloration from it.
customer_reviews.author: caryn

customer_reviews.title: Waste if money.
customer_reviews.text: This makes you look like the guy from shallow Hal. If you want a powder look on your head then this is for you. It doesn't make the hair look fuller at all. Big waste if money.
customer_reviews.author: Shortbusharry

customer_reviews.title: and it looks like will do the what I want it to do
customer_reviews.text: I use this product one time so far, and it looks like will do the what I want it to do, I just need to buy the top to put on it to spray it and not sprinkle it in. so far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: I cannot really comment as one container was cracked and ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot really comment as one container was cracked and the ingredients was spilled out inside of the box so when I opened the box it spilled out all over my white carpet and I cannot get it up. I have not yet tried the 1 container that was still intact as I am so frustrated that I received it cracked with a mess everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Not For Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: If you have highly sensitive skin, PLEASE DON'T USE THIS. Your scalp will burn and itch after a bit. This doesn't work on people who have significant thinning hair. It looks as if you have colored hair rinse residue that hasn't been washed off the scalp (like many elderly women do), in direct lighting. It's not easy to match colors as they are limited.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Reese

customer_reviews.title: Caution:  Verify size of product
customer_reviews.text: Caution: I purchased this product and neglected to get the size. I received a sample size, as in miniature. Needless to say, the best I could do was laugh about the 3 grams of product in the container. Colour is OK in the Auburn. Needless to say, other similar products are a much better deal for same results. This may just be the seller I used at time of purchase since current ad indicates .42 oz which is a lot more than 3 gr.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Toppik Hair Building Fibers, Auburn
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for my thinning hair. Just shake in on, follow with the spray (sold separate), style and go. The color matches perfect. It is easy, I do truly love it.
customer_reviews.author: Broncolina

customer_reviews.title: Toppik has changed the color formula...Auburn is now a muddy brown:(
customer_reviews.text: I've used Toppik Auburn Fibers for years and have been very happy with it. However, now they've changed the color and the Auburn is more like a muddy brown than Auburn. I tried to phone customer service and got a person in Utah who had no clue and kept apologizing to me. The bottle seems to be made somewhere new too, because it has Auburn/Roux/Rojo on it, rather than the old bottles that just had Auburn on the label. So best to go to a beauty supply where you can inquire about the product.
customer_reviews.author: SmarieL

customer_reviews.title: Order it...you won't regret!
customer_reviews.text: Got this miracle stuff yesterday and it's already changed my Outlook on life! I always had thick hair but medication changed that! My part got wider through the years and as my top got thinner my confidence got smaller,I am a barber so I figured out how to hide the baldness somewhat. I am a female btw so my hair is important...used to get loads of compliments but those faded along with my pretty locks. I am so impressed with this product, that I saw on a TV commercial, so grabbed my phone to see if Amazon carried it...yes, they do! It matches perfectly and looks very natural. I'm a happy gal!
customer_reviews.author: cindy strohl

customer_reviews.title: great for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair on top is very thin due to Meds and age, when I use the product after I do my hair, it makes it look fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Waltraud

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: As I wrote in my review of the Toppik Spray Applicator - I might have ordered the wrong color. My hair is auburn and I ordered auburn. It's wayyyyyy too light. I've since ordered the Derm Match System which is much more expensive but they guarantee it for you to be completely satisfied for a year of purchase. My hair is thinning and I think there are better products for this than Toppik.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Wright

product_meta.title: Toppik Hair Building Natural Keratin Fibers for Men & Women to Conceal Thinning Hair Instantly
product_meta.description: Color:Auburn| Size:12 GramToppik Hair Building Fibers, made of colored keratin protein, blend undetectably with existing hair strands to instantly create the appearance of naturally thick, full hair. Ingredients - Keratin, Ammonium chloride, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, [+/-: Orange 4 (CI 15510), Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Red 33 (CI 17200), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Green 3 (CI 42053), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Red 22 (CI 45380), Green 6 (CI 61565), Green 5 (CI 61570)]

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
